6742c63e-dcf4-42aa-8639-035b3e92a52b.description: The discipline of Foresight helps people and organizations understand, map, and influence change. While the future is unpredictable, understanding the dynamics of change and the plausible ways in which it could occur helps individuals and organizations build the confidence and desire to prepare for these changes. More importantly, the ability to influence those changes, countering threats and capitalizing on opportunities, requires leaders with a compelling vision and flexible strategic plan.
6742c63e-dcf4-42aa-8639-035b3e92a52b.name: Foresight

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Completing a 5 day boot-camp style training course. Participating in exercises, discussions, and project activities in a physical or virtual classroom setting. Working with professional colleagues in teams to complete a sample foresight project

8a858622-898d-41ac-bd44-ba8da35ae1a5.description: The Project Management certificate course is dedicated to educating project management working professionals with knowledge base, vocabularies, and tools grounded in the official Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK®) 6th Edition. In this 5-day intensive course, you will learn the project management methodology and standards required to manage projects successfully.
8a858622-898d-41ac-bd44-ba8da35ae1a5.name: Project Management

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 40 hours of instruction in Project Management Methodology and earn 40 PDUs. Use PM methodology to organize and plan a standard project . Create a work breakdown structure. Learn and use Project Management techniques to manage project schedules, budgets, quality and teams. Work in teams during the course to emulate project teams in real world scenarios. Use PM standards to monitor and control project execution.

b4168116-d009-421c-bfdc-129a47685f82.description: Earning an Introduction to Logistics Certificate through the Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program, through the University of Houston College of Technology, in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides students an introduction to the concept of logistics in its widest sense and to some of the general practices that are important in every part of the logistics working environment.
b4168116-d009-421c-bfdc-129a47685f82.name: Introduction to Logistics Level II

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to Logistics is specifically designed to provide an understanding of people in the working environment, sustainability and the environment and communications technology required of a logistics practitioner.

cb7905f8-a5cb-4073-a90e-6bf78e49058a.description: With approx. 60 hrs. of comprehensive, live instructor-led content with hands-on whiteboard discussions and labs, the AWS@UH certification training program helps the participants to build unmatched technical expertise and advanced skills that improve their knowledge, arm them with the latest best practices; and, prepare them for the AWS Cloud Practitioner and/or the AWS Solutions Architect certification exams.
cb7905f8-a5cb-4073-a90e-6bf78e49058a.name: Amazon Web Services Certified Solutions Architect – Associate

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Participant must attend and actively participate in all training sessions to earn the AWS@UH Certification Training credential (Seven live sessions in addition to hands-on labs).  Participant has some professional experience supporting the IT organization and/or technology experience within the IT organization. Participants meets the pre-requisites for this course.

skills.name: AWS Cloud Adoption And TCO Management

15f68f29-7d46-4d55-9f51-2573b89af45c.description: Green Belts lead small-medium Lean Six Sigma project teams and/or support project teams led by Black Belts to help their organizations improve efficiency and reduce variability in all types of processes. As a trained Green Belt, you have the knowledge to apply appropriate Lean Six Sigma tools and techniques to identify opportunities for improvement, map processes, collect and analyze data, identify root causes, and implement process changes.
15f68f29-7d46-4d55-9f51-2573b89af45c.name: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Course

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete coursework and pass a formal exam.

6831d399-5f15-48dd-91e4-85bc1e977daa.description: Earning the Introduction to Customer Service and Marketing Certificate through the University of Houston College of Technology Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program, in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides entry level industry professionals with the basic knowledge required by front line and supervisory staff in the logistics and transport businesses who deal with customers.
6831d399-5f15-48dd-91e4-85bc1e977daa.name: Introduction to Customer Service and Marketing

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Earning the Introduction to Customer Service and Marketing Badge requires the completion of 40 hours of self-paced online learning along with 30 applied assignments and a final exam.

d5964be4-6dcc-4657-8bff-3c30f7925591.description: Earning an Inventory Certificate through the Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program at the University of Houston College of Technology, in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides industry professionals an insight into managing inventory, controlling stock and managing performance.
d5964be4-6dcc-4657-8bff-3c30f7925591.name: Inventory Level III

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certification is specifically designed to provide a holistic understanding of alternatives to holding inventory, cost associated with inventory, forecasting and inventory systems. Methods for controlling inventory and managing performance through KPI’s, inventory tracking and inventory auditing are explored.

1ce82a5c-2f43-4cc7-a4fb-f6645307a384.description: The 5-day PMP® Exam Prep Book-camp is dedicated to preparing project management working professionals for the PMP® certification exam. The 5-day camp provides 40 hrs. of face-to-face instructions grounded in the official Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK®) 6th Edition. You will develop a mental model for organizing and remembering the specific bits of information covered in the PMBOK® Guide and the recommended references needed to pass the PMP Certification Exam.
1ce82a5c-2f43-4cc7-a4fb-f6645307a384.name: PMP Exam Prep Boot-Camp

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 40 hours of instruction face to face or online instructions grounded in the official Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK®) 6th Edition. Take and review PMP® practice tests. Review PMP® test prep questions and phrasing in the exam. Review test taking techniques for success. Earn 40 Project Management Education hours (PDUs) needed to sit for the PMP® Exam. Be ready to take PMP® exam upon completing the boot camp.

911bdcee-f135-4422-ace0-282a608558e1.description: Earning a Warehousing Certificate through the Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program, College of Technology, University of Houston in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides industry professionals with the critical knowledge and understanding of warehousing, and to thereby deliver the skills required by an aspiring Warehouse Manager to operate effectively.
911bdcee-f135-4422-ace0-282a608558e1.name: Warehousing Level III

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certification is specifically designed to provide an understanding of warehouses transformation from mere storage places for goods to that of complex operations that continue to add value to supply chain and give competitive advantages to organizations.

7a1006f0-2de0-425e-828a-ac0f64b3ca2c.description: Earning a Construction Management (CM) Certificate provides industry professionals with essential knowledge and skills to help advance their careers and deliver successful projects. Students are prepared for effective leadership in estimating, scheduling, project controls, contract management, and project management.
7a1006f0-2de0-425e-828a-ac0f64b3ca2c.name: Construction Management

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Earning the CM Certificate requires the completion of four online courses. Students will earn 16 Continuing Education Units (CEUs), which is equivalent to 160 instructional hours.  Completion of the certificate courses also prepares students to sit for licensing exams such as the Certified Professional Contractor offered by the American Institute of Constructors.

9ce28591-07a8-4899-8b9b-5339e07c8770.description: Based on the Predictive project development process groups of the PMBOK Guide 6th EDN. The course teaches students how to manage projects across several industries (Construction, Manufacturing, Engineering, Healthcare, Information Tech). Emphasis is on the PMBOK Knowledge Areas (Management of Stakeholders, Scope, Quality, Procurement, Communication, Resource, Time, Cost, Risk, and Integration). Students will progress from project Initiation, Planning, Execution, Monitoring/Control, and Closure.
9ce28591-07a8-4899-8b9b-5339e07c8770.name: Project Management Framework

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Based on the Predictive project development process groups of the PMBOK Guide 6th EDN. The course teaches students how to manage projects across several industries (Construction, Manufacturing, Engineering, Healthcare, Information Tech). Emphasis is on the PMBOK Knowledge Areas (Management of Stakeholders, Scope, Quality, Procurement, Communication, Resource, Time, Cost, Risk, and Integration). Students will progress from project Initiation, Planning, Execution, Monitoring/Control, and Closure.

d2cce2b7-2844-471a-a507-af1797bc5af5.description: Earning a Procurement Certificate through the University of Houston College of Technology Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program, in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides industry professionals with an applied knowledge of procurement as a key strategic element in any supply chain process. A Supply Chain comprises all activities associated with the flow and transformation of goods, raw materials stage through to the final consumer.
d2cce2b7-2844-471a-a507-af1797bc5af5.name: Procurement Level III

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Earning the Procurement Badge requires the completion of 40 plus hours of self-paced online learning along with 28 applied assignments and a final exam.

e89ffcc3-1600-43c6-87ef-29bde480a2b3.description: Earning an Introduction to Purchasing Certificate through University of Houston College of Technology Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides entry level industry professionals with the principles and techniques involved in best practice procurement.
e89ffcc3-1600-43c6-87ef-29bde480a2b3.name: Introduction to Purchasing Level II

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Earning the Introduction to Purchasing Badge requires the completion of 40 hours of self-paced online learning along with 26 applied assignments and a final exam.

842e7d7f-830c-4e74-a1c0-20b4a3925fcf.description: Earning a Construction Management (CM) Certificate provides industry professionals with essential knowledge and skills to help advance their careers and deliver successful projects. Students are prepared for effective leadership in estimating, scheduling, project controls, contract management, and project management.

e45586b6-8e2a-4e24-8fef-d4fe7f3bbfb6.description: Earning a Supply Chain Operations Certificate through the Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program, College of Technology, University of Houston in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides industry professionals with the tools and techniques needed to identify key performance indicators for supply chain operations, along with approaches to enhance performance.
e45586b6-8e2a-4e24-8fef-d4fe7f3bbfb6.name: Supply Chain Operations Level III

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certification is specifically designed to provide an understanding of the commercial and operational environment for organizations covering the following aspects: Suppliers; Competitors; Labor markets; Financial institutions; Customers; Trade unions; Governments; and Customers.

5a7a188c-0119-4bb0-af06-cf8da4632caa.description: Earning an Introduction to Warehouse and Inventory Certificate through the University Of Houston College Of Technology Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program, in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides entry level industry professionals an introduction to the concept of warehousing and inventory and their place in a Supply Chain. This certification is designed to equip participants with a solid foundation of knowledge on which they can build with experience
5a7a188c-0119-4bb0-af06-cf8da4632caa.name: Introduction to Warehouse and Inventory

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Earning the Introduction to Warehouse and Inventory Badge requires the completion of 40 hours of self-paced online learning along with 59 applied assignments and a final exam.

0ae388a6-e3bb-4042-ba86-b74b22bd08c8.description: Earning a Green Logistics Certificate through the University of Houston College of Technology Supply Chain & Logistics Technology Program, in collaboration with the Chartered Institute Logistics & Transport provides industry professionals with the tools and techniques used to assess and measure the environmental impact and sustainability of logistics and supply chain operations and how they can be used to monitor and improve sustainable businesses.
0ae388a6-e3bb-4042-ba86-b74b22bd08c8.name: Green Logistics

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certification is specifically designed to provide a holistic understanding of green and sustainable logistics and supply chain management. It covers the environmental impact of logistics and supply chain operations, modal considerations, energy efficiency, future trends and strategies, the management of change aimed at improving sustainability and the required performance measures and performance monitoring that will be required in order to bring about such desired and planned changes.
Earning the Green Logistics Badge requires the completion of 40 plus hours of self-paced online learning along with 19 applied assignments and a final exam.

a3e48558-de7b-40ac-8fd8-7d5e842c9830.description: The online PMP® Exam Prep course is dedicated to preparing project management working professionals for PMP® (Project Management Professional) certification exam. Registered students will have access to the online course for 6 months upon confirmed registration. The course includes over 16 individual lessons covering ten knowledge areas grounded in the official Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK®) 6th Edition.
a3e48558-de7b-40ac-8fd8-7d5e842c9830.name: Online PMP Exam Prep

Create a work breakdown structure. Learn and use Project Management techniques to manage project schedules, budgets, quality and teams. Work in teams during the course to emulate project teams in real world scenarios. Use PM standards to monitor and control project execution

ddf3412a-be3c-45c3-a825-41ed57b2dbab.description: Students achieving the UH College of Technology Leadership skills badge are able to think and act as an effective leader. They have acquired the different skill sets that make an effective leader, and will be able to demonstrate them throughout their time as an officer of a College of Technology student organization. Recipients are skilled in engaging audiences through teamwork, understanding and leadership.
ddf3412a-be3c-45c3-a825-41ed57b2dbab.name: Leadership Skills

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students will participate in a two day workshop, during this time they will engage with different experts that will teach them about different areas of becoming an effective leader.

9530febb-e64d-4af5-9a13-634cbd601f97.description: Black Belts lead Lean Six Sigma project teams, mentor Green Belts, and liaise with Master Black Belts and Champions to achieve significant performance improvement and economic impact. As a trained Black Belt, you have the knowledge to identify opportunities for improvement within your organization, use the Lean Six Sigma methodology, and apply the appropriate advanced tools and techniques within a Lean Six Sigma project.
9530febb-e64d-4af5-9a13-634cbd601f97.name: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Course

As a trained Yellow Belt, you have the knowledge to understand Lean Six Sigma terminology and support process mapping, data collection, and solution implementation activities within a Lean Six Sigma project.
795f9402-f814-4862-b972-38532c2d804e.name: Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt Course

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete coursework and pass a formal exam.

80e77bd1-af53-42b7-8903-b66ba82ada0a.description: This class covers the following topics: piping design, the effects on overall configuration on preliminary piping design, initial layout, the total system, introduction to pipe stress analysis, detailed piping design, and how all of this influences pipe support and pipe hanger design.
80e77bd1-af53-42b7-8903-b66ba82ada0a.name: Piping Design & Analysis Influence On Pipe Support Selection & Design

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

88b428f3-dc3e-48d8-8ea7-f95383de6705.description: Students achieving the UH College of Technology Student Ambassador badge are able to present an upbeat and positive overview of the college’s academic majors, student services, and instructional quality to prospective students. They are also able to provide academic recommendations regarding a specific major and general guidance for student success. Recipients are skilled in engaging audiences in a virtual environment using online tools, teamwork, flexibility, and punctuality.
88b428f3-dc3e-48d8-8ea7-f95383de6705.name: UH CoT Student Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Completed an online application and participated in an interview.

Completed at least one-year of successful academic instruction within the College of Technology while maintaining at least a 2.5 GPA.  Most ambassadors achieve a 3.0 or better and have received academic honors.
Engaged in at least 15 hours of recruiting presentations and outreach tasks.

dfcb45f2-51ce-4d39-a7e0-fc74af1d69ae.description: This class covers the following topics: Expansion joint design, the different types of expansion joints, metallic bellows vs. fabric bellows, fabric expansion joint design, expansion joint stress analysis, equilibrium and anchor forces, field services and detailed info on the manufacturing plant where our expansion joints are created.
dfcb45f2-51ce-4d39-a7e0-fc74af1d69ae.name: Expansion Joint Design & Application

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

As a Black Belt, you are able able to identify opportunities for improvement within your organization, use the Lean Six Sigma methodology, and apply appropriate advanced tools and techniques within a Lean Six Sigma project.
49d7fcda-472e-4e0d-b1b0-46f668a81991.name: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Certification

a71ddc34-7c73-457f-b4e5-8f00fc9fa9bc.description: The Visual Storytelling (Video Production for Transmedia) course is designed to familiarize students with single-camera digital video production and editing. Students will learn the technology, art and practices involved in effective visual storytelling. By the completion of this course students will have a foundational understanding of, and practical experience in writing, producing, directing, shooting, and editing digital motion media both live action and graphical.
a71ddc34-7c73-457f-b4e5-8f00fc9fa9bc.name: Video Production

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 weeks of online instruction; Conceive and write story treatments; Adapt treatments to script form; Organize crews and assign duties; Scout and secure production locations; Design and light sets; Shoot scenes from script; Work with green-screen special effects; Capture content to computer; Edit content in Adobe Premiere; Output and deliver finished production

1dfda92d-5ab4-45a4-9ca2-b7ee9b97d207.description: A certificate in Border Operations Management holder is equipped with professional competencies to successfully manage myriad challenges, monitor, and control the flows of passengers and cargo; apply ethically sound practices in organizational excellence at strategic, operational, and tactical levels aligned with the mission of homeland security agencies; and evaluate border management strategies across numerous countries by analyzing policy and legal frameworks.
1dfda92d-5ab4-45a4-9ca2-b7ee9b97d207.name: Border Operations Management

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a four-course certification. Earn 12 college credits. Present results of case-studies. Complete a capstone project for each course.

da435fba-a427-431f-97d9-1436b86cf901.description: Holders of a Certificate in Border Trade and Transport Security will be equipped with professional competencies to assess different types of trade agreements implemented between the U.S. government and its partners. They will be able to monitor and control the inbound and outbound flows of passengers and cargo; evaluate the concepts of free trade vs. protectionism, or open vs. closed borders. They will become familiar with the U.S. customs, taxes, and tariffs protocols.
da435fba-a427-431f-97d9-1436b86cf901.name: Certificate in Borders, Trade, and Transport Security

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a four-course certification. Earn 12 college credits. Present results of case-studies and complete a capstone project for each course

62bbe7dd-2f75-477f-9975-cafa16e5655b.description: The Content Strategy course prepares and guides the creatives through the fundamentals of planning and developing an effective content strategy marketing camping, conducting competitor research, creating personas for audience development, writing marketing and content plans, and producing a marketing campaign for social media.
62bbe7dd-2f75-477f-9975-cafa16e5655b.name: Content Strategy

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 weeks of online instruction; create a marketing and content plans; perform research and conduct interviews; construct a Persona; set objectives and key performance indicators; write an email marketing plan and design a personalized email; develop a social media plan and create posts; conduct a presentation on the content marketing strategy.

7ba66106-ad71-48f9-a77a-8c81cc0f037d.description: The basic concepts of finance, marketing, and operations are part of the curriculum. Participants explore data mining’s power and benefits in a series of practical Case Studies that discuss the use of marketing databases and new information resources critical to solving realistic day-to-day scenarios. During the course, students encounter an array of evolving technologies experienced in Transmedia Marketing® communications.
7ba66106-ad71-48f9-a77a-8c81cc0f037d.name: Data Mining

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 weeks of online instruction; explore real-life business case studies; do research using database mining programs; use various search engines to uncover relevant information; present creative and practical pathways to solve problems, achieve goals and discover new directions. Students will primarily use Microsoft Word and Excel for assignment submissions.

e2848fc2-b2ff-48d0-8616-4c5b37d61d6d.description: This course was designed and is taught by very experienced systems analysts and project managers with decades of experience in managing requirements and scope definition. PMI-PBA content is aligned with the certification Examination Content Outline and with the PMI Business Analysis for Practitioners Practice Guide. Course material includes over 300 sample PMI-PBASM exam questions and this supports the objective of effectively preparing course participants pass the formal PMI certification exam.
e2848fc2-b2ff-48d0-8616-4c5b37d61d6d.name: PMI-PBA Exam Prep Boot-Camp

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Review PMI-PBA content. Take and review PMI-PBA® practice tests. Review PMI-PBA® test prep questions and phrasing in the exam. Review test taking techniques for success. Earn 35 Project Management Education hours (PDUs) needed to sit for the PMI-PBA® Exam. Be ready to take PMI-PBA® exam upon completing the boot camp.

49b39fde-f8d2-4ca3-bb75-73c51428a8e4.description: The Transmedia Marketing® course guides media makers and marketers through the fundamentals of mastering an effective transmedia strategy and execution plan to create a vibrant transmedia marketing campaign across multiple media platforms, with new content and heavy audience participation.
49b39fde-f8d2-4ca3-bb75-73c51428a8e4.name: Transmedia Marketing

issuer.summary: issued by University of Houston College of Technology

entity.name: University of Houston College of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 12 weeks of online instruction; Conceive and write campaign; Map out effective campaign strategy; Develop Transmedia campaign Bible; Create video; Create social media ads; Create website.

skills.name: Social Media Strategy And Ad Development
